title: How to help quake victims
author: Unknown
text: People in the Seattle area who wish to help earthquake relief efforts in San Salvador may call University Baptist Church, 632-5188.     The Rev. Donovan Cook said there is a special need for persons with medical expertise who would be willing to travel to the stricken city. He said relief efforts are being coordinated through the Archdiocese of San Salvador and the sanctuary movement of the United State.
